title: Answer
description: An answer offered to a question; perhaps correct, perhaps opinionated or wrong.

allOf.description: A comment on an item - for example, a comment on a blog post. The comment's content is expressed via the [[text]] property, and its topic via [[about]], properties shared with all CreativeWorks.

answerExplanation.description: A step-by-step or full explanation about Answer. Can outline how this Answer was achieved or contain more broad clarification or statement about it.
